key.name: maximized-behavior
key.description: Determines what style to apply to the top bar when there is a maximized window: keep the normal gradient, use the default theme, or apply a custom style.

key.name: maximization-type
key.description: Determines what constitutes a maximized window: both horizontally and vertically maximized, only vertically maximized, only horizontally maximized, or any of these.

key.name: colors
key.description: Lists all of the colours that are saved for the gradient of the top bar in a serialized rgba() format.

key.name: gradient-direction
key.description: The orientation of the gradient can either be "vertical" or "horizontal"

key.name: maximized-colors
key.summary: Array of the gradient colours for maximized windows
key.description: Lists all of the colours that are saved for the gradient of the top bar when a window is maximized.

key.name: maximized-gradient-direction
key.summary: The orientation of the gradient for maximized windows
key.description: The orientation of the gradient when a window is maximized.
